fields.name: Photo
fields.description: Photo of you and Sam. There's a note on the back: 'A good night'.

fields.name: Hook
fields.description: Large metal hook. Probably used in a meat factory or for commercial fishing.

fields.name: Ticket
fields.description: Untorn orange ticket. Reminds you of riding The Zipper at the county fair.

fields.name: Key
fields.description: Small silver key. Looks like the one that went to the lockbox hidden under the backseat of Remy's truck.

fields.name: Diamond
fields.description: Small diamond. Probably worth a lot.

fields.name: Ruby
fields.description: Small ruby. Probably worth a lot.

fields.name: Emerald
fields.description: Small emerald. Probably worth a lot.

fields.name: Sapphire
fields.description: Small sapphire. Probably worth a lot.

fields.name: Tooth
fields.description: Human canine tooth. This is the upper-right tooth. Four would make a full set. You start thinking of red kites and summer sun.

fields.name: Tooth
fields.description: Human canine tooth. This is the upper-left tooth. Four would make a full set. You start thinking of red kites and summer sun.

fields.name: Tooth
fields.description: Human canine tooth. This is the lower-right tooth. Four would make a full set. You start thinking of red kites and summer sun.

fields.name: Tooth
fields.description: Human canine tooth. This is the lower-left tooth. Four would make a full set. You start thinking of red kites and summer sun.

fields.name: Note
fields.description: Note from shipwreck. There are a ton of characters at the top of the page that you don't recognize. Several arrows lead from those characters and point to a message at the bottom of the page. It reads: 'ONE GOOD NIGHT. I JUST WANT ONE GOOD NIGHT. IS THAT SO MUCH TO ASK?'
